name: Grab the Flag and Come Home
debriefing: Our congratulations on the successful completion of the mission! ~~Remember, you'd better pick up the coins on the field; cash never gets too heavy.
briefing: So, you are to capture the red flag and return home with it. ~~Keep in mind that the area is limited, and the flag is well defended. Other than that, you are expected almost at the very entry point; that means you'll have to start fighting right off.
